a: I don't understand what you mean
mosi: Mono ke bakisa ve mambu ya nge ke tuba

Mono ke zolaka mama na mono
ya ke wakana ve ti nsiku

a: many many happy returns of the day

a: Our mission: to enable everyone, everywhere to understand the world and express themselves across languages.
mosi: Kisalu na beto: kusadisa bantu yonso, ya bisika yonso na kubakisa nsi-ntoto mpi ya kumonisa bangindu na bo na nzila ya bandinga.

a: Our mission: to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.
mosi: Kisalu na beto: kuyidika bansangu ya nsi-ntoto mpi kusala na mpila nde bantu yonso kumona yo mpi yo vanda mfunu sambu na bo.
kima ya kutula na kisika ya ntete
bima ya ke kumisaka madia ntomo
